BOFM90.description: Read the entire Book of Mormon in 90 days
BOFM90.title: Book of Mormon 90

DTG.description: Work on your Duty to God for at least half an hour
DTG.title: Duty to God

FASTING.description: Fast for two meals at least each month on Fast Sunday with a purpose
FASTING.title: Fasting

GC.description: Study one talk from the most recent General Conference
GC.title: General Conference Talks

JOURNAL.description: Record your progress and how the Lord has blessed your life each day
JOURNAL.title: Journal Writing

MAG.description: Read an article from a recent issue of the New Era or Ensign
MAG.title: Church Magazines

PMG.description: Study a chapter in Preach My Gospel. Study enough to finish the chapter by the end of the week.
PMG.title: Topical Study: Preach My Gospel

PONDER.description: Find some time each day to quietly ponder the gospel and your life
PONDER.title: Pondering

PP.description: Work on your Personal Progress for at least half an hour
PP.title: Personal Progress

PRAY.description: Have a meaningful conversation with your Heavenly Father at least morning and night
PRAY.title: Meaningful Prayer

SERVICE.description: Perform at least one act of service each day
SERVICE.title: Service

SM-BOFM.description: Memorize the Book of Mormon scripture mastery scriptures
SM-BOFM.title: Scripture Mastery: Book of Mormon

TEMPLE.description: If you hold a temple recommend, attend the temple at least once a month
TEMPLE.title: Temple Attendance
